about_the_game:
"Weapons Arena Demo" is a top-down, turn-based strategy game where players control a firearm to break through encirclements of melee weapons!

This demo includes:
-Content from the first chapter
-Over 20 types of enemies
-50 talents and corresponding 50 upgraded talents
-8 maps with 4 different level modes

Game Features:

Easy to pick up, hard to master


The game has minimal controls: use the mouse to aim in four directions, and left-click to shoot. Due to recoil, shooting also causes you to move backward. This means a single action both attacks and moves you. Therefore, players must carefully consider each action, as every shot triggers a series of chain reactions.

Transparent enemy intentions make combat more strategic


Observe, understand, and decipher enemy behavior patterns. Avoid danger through careful positioning and defeat enemies strategically.

Roguelike upgrades add depth to gameplay


After each level, players can choose one upgrade from three randomly offered abilities, such as penetration, auto-aim, knockback, or explosion. While these upgrades can make you stronger, they also come with risks, such as close-range explosions damaging yourself. Auto-aim might not always target your desired enemy. Constructing your abilities wisely and exploring interactions between different weapons and talents becomes an essential part of the game!
